amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for State and local grants, including the Urban Areas Security Initiative (UASI) by $337 million offset by reductions in Border Security Fencing, Infrastructure and Technology accounts of a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amdendment to increase funding, by offset, for state and local programsby $337,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cicilline amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 154 - 266 (Roll no. 385).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Cicilline amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 154 - 266 (Roll no. 385).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Cicilline.
